'''Tiny Miracle's Hourglass''' is an [[Artifact]] in the set [[Tiny Miracle]].

==Description==
It is often said that one may achieve victory by striving, but receive a miracle only by waiting.<br />But is it not a miracle that fine sand was once a hard rock?<br />Is it not too a miracle that we met each other?
